channel.title: Vengeance-X PvP || Curses, Quick Prayers, Miasmics ||
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/4749/bannerzm.jpg[/img]
[B]Moving on to Hyperion (that rhymes); so I don't need this anymore.[/B]
[B]Server Features: [/B]
[ul][*]Better curses added [*]PvP System [*]Unique donator rewards [*]Vote4Cash system [*]Cleaned+ Repackaged source [*]Auto-donation added [*]Correct weapons animation [*]Better project insanity combat [*]Barrage orbs [*]Bounty hunter added [*]Cycle event manager [*]Removed errors according to eclipse [*]Made some code make more sense [*]Improved memory usage slightly [*]Didn't pack as much into process [*]Kept code organized [*]Works on Debian[/ul]
[B]Client Features: [/B]
[ul][*]602 animations, gfx, npcs [*]660 items [*]Cache packed or compressed files [*]Organized cache [*]Quick Prayers [*]Ancient magic interface with miasmics[/ul]
[/CENTER]
[CENTER][img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/rushing.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/ags.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/vls.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/statius.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/barrageorbs.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/overloads.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/following.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/pvpswitching.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/gif/pvplevels.gif[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/images/Bounty_hunter.png[/img] [img]http://www.vengeance-x.com/advertise/images/Packaged.png[/img] [/CENTER]
[CENTER][B]Links: [/B] [I]Source: [/I][URL=http://uppit.com/md0ha77xdgj9/Vengeance-X_Source.rar]Vengeance-X Source[/URL] [I]Client: [/I][URL=http://uppit.com/yszhz9yhsg3n/Vengeance_Client.rar]Vengeance-X Client[/URL] [I]Cache: [/I][url=http://uppit.com/g7zbyi1sybl9/.vengeancex.rar [/url]
[B]Credits: [/B] Me Pasi Nick[/CENTER]

item.description:
@k2_k0 wrote:

hey is anyone willing to help me out with my client? =\ it seems to not be working for me and i cannot figure out the problem…
it keeps getting stuck at

Requesting Title Screen…

And Here’s the error that it gives me

java.io.FileNotFoundException: null\vengeancex\main_file_cache.dat (The system c
annot find the path specified)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.open(Native Method)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.RandomAccessFile.(Unknown Source)
at sign.signlink.run(signlink.java:42)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
error retreiving archivaed name.
error retreiving archivaed name.
java.net.MalformedURLException: no protocol:
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URL.(Unknown Source)
at CacheDownloader.downloadFile(CacheDownloader.java:100)
at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:68)
at client.startUp(client.java:8064)
at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:34)
at client.run(client.java:5854)

java.io.FileNotFoundException: null\vengeancex (The system cannot find the path
specified)

at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)

So if anyone could help it would be appreciated!
